# Order palcing days in the resto
plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
temp = df.day.value_counts().reset_index().rename(columns = {"index" : "days", "day": "occurances"})
plt.title("The No. of orders recieved per day ",  fontdict={'fontsize' : 25})
sns.barplot(x="occurances", y ="days",data = temp, palette="inferno")
plt.show()

# Most Busiest Day is Friday
